title: Bug Splatting out of every game
body: This has been happening in all my game recently just randomly bug splatting out of games i am able to connect but it does it quite a bit I can't even play cause it is just too annoying? Any solutions?

replies.body: Typically those bugsplats mean that some of those game files weren't updated properly or just aren't working they way they should for some reason. Check out the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for some basic general troubleshooting, but you could also try grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **reinstall and clean uninstall**.
Still happening even when I did both of those things. Any other suggestions?
